jobDescription: FCA's Connected Vehicle Operations team is looking for an enthusiastic and capable Data Analyst who will be responsible for generating, analyzing, refining and presenting connected vehicle data that is critical to building better products as well as improved customer experience. FCA's connected vehicle team is growing rapidly and provides challenges and opportunities to make a difference. If this is something you are looking for then look no more.  Main Responsibilities include: Lead connected vehicle data analysis by writing SQL queries to pull data from several FCA internal databases, analyze and refine data to generate and present meaningful reportsSupport new product launches, Firmware-Over-The-Air (FOTA) campaigns, volume forecasts, factory VIN feed process and several other ad-hoc data analysis requests.Support Connected Vehicle Operations support teams on all data needs to resolve customer issuesCoordinate and Collaborate with internal as well as external IT and engineering teams to monitor and, analyze back-end information flow on key connected vehicle processesWork actively with product planning and marketing teams to generate data that is essential to launching features as well as customer communication
